knimeNode.name: Library Generator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generate a reference library from input columns.

fullDescription.intro: The node takes the selected input columns and generates a reference library that can be used with nodes from the MassCascade plug-in.
fullDescription.option: The value for the reference spectrum (String).

ports.inPort: Table containing a set of value columns.
ports.outPort: Table containing the generated reference library.
